scripts.build_all: npm run build_es6 && npm run build_cjs
scripts.build_cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs && babel dist/es6 --out-dir dist/cjs --modules common --sourceMaps --loose all
scripts.build_es6: rm -rf dist/es6 && tsc typings/angular2/angular2.d.ts src/index.ts --outDir dist/es6 --target ES6 -d --experimentalDecorators
scripts.build_source: rm -rf dist/src && tsc typings/angular2/angular2.d.ts src/index.ts --outDir dist/src --target ES5 -d --experimentalDecorators --module commonjs
scripts.build_test: rm -rf dist/test && tsc typings/tsd.d.ts test/foo_spec.ts --outDir dist/test --target ES5 -d --experimentalDecorators --module commonjs
